notesStmt.note: [NOTES: the original title of the questionnaire is “An Eaglais Chaitligeach”]
[NOTES: there is a note attached to the list by the informant – ‘pp. 6-9 – still working on them’. The list is typed. Accents were added by hand but only on the first two pages.]

div.head: 3. Laithean fèille na bliadhna agus cleachdaidhean co-cheangailte rui

entry.def: Feast of the Holy Family (Sunday in Octave of Christmas).
Feast of Motherhood of Our Lady (January 1st).
Baptism of the Lord (Sunday after 6th January).
Feast of Sacred Heart (Friday after second Sunday after Pentecost).
Feast of Christ the King (last Sunday before Advent).

form.orth: La Fheill Moire a Ghineadh gun Smal

div.head: 4. Gach pàirt dhen eaglais agus àiteachan sonraichte am broinn na h-eaglais
5. Nìthean a tha air a cleachdadh ann a bhith deanamh aifreann neo seirbheis

entry.def: Oil of Chrism (used in Baptism and Confirmation).
Oil of the Sacrament of the Sick; Oleum Infirmorum.

div.head: 10. Seòrsachan ùrnaigh agus cleachdaidhean co-cheangailte rui

entry.def: The Lord’s Prayer, The Pater Noster.
The Ave Maria, The Hail Mary.
Way of the Cross, Via Crucis.
Prayer to Our Lady of the Isles.
Communion (Part of Mass or Sacred Species).
List of the Dead (remembered during Bidding Prayer).
